author: SaintElsewhere
title: BUY IT! BUY IT! BUY IT!
review: This game is great and very faithful to the movies, but with a tounge-in-cheek Lego attitude. An improvement on the Lego Star Wars games. Anyone who doesn't buy this is a Communist! You can play as Indy and like, 50 other characters. 18 levels in total, plus secret levels! YAY!:) If this was as good as it was, who knows what Lego Batman will be like!
